text:
Trade Machines | http://trademachines.com | Berlin - Germany | On-Site | Full-Time

Trade Machines is a fast growing Start-up, whose international team has many years of experience in conducting e-business. Our vision is to build the world's largest platform for online industrial auctions.

Our current playground: PHP (Symfony 2), Scala, Elasticsearch, Mongo, AWS EC2/ECS/Kinesis/DynamoDB

We are looking for:

- PHP developers, interested in functional programming (scala) and devops

- Frontend developers (HTML5, bootstrap, sass, grunt, twig)

You can find more infos on http://trademachines.com/jobs
